description: 3 Brothers-in-Law from Galilee have brought their worldly expertise and experience to America’s Finest City to serve the perfect blend of freshness, healthiness, and sweetness in every cup of their heavenly handmade smoothies. Smoothie Rider uses California’s finest seasonal produce, as well as their own homemade date honey and almond milk, to concoct these delicious refreshing beverages - perfect for enjoying any day the fresh way. Savor a crisp autumn “Perfect Sunrize” with orange juice, white flaxseed, peeled mandarin, pineapple, granny smith apple, and coconut water. During the summer, delight in a “Peach on the Beach” with goat yogurt, nectarine, peach, lime juice, and plum. Every season, there’s a juicy reason to come by and take a sip of Smoothie Rider’s sensational selection!
name: Smoothie Rider
